message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.CC. 

The paper deals with the problem of maintaining an encoded distributed storage system in the presence of adversarial errors, which is a topic that falls under the scope of information theory (cs.IT) and distributed systems (cs.DS). The proposed linear hashing scheme involves error detection, which is a common technique in cryptography (cs.CR). The paper also discusses the transmission rate achieved by the scheme, which is related to network coding and capacity (cs.DC, cs.CC).
